title: What are some great lies about the world history which went undetected for too long? - Quora

response.answer_text: Earth was flat… which was believed to be true by everybody till 500 years ago. World was created for humans… every mythology had the same summary with different stories. People still behave like that's true. There's an afterlife… no need to explain this one. People bury, cremate, soil their ashes and much more to their beloved's flesh seeking solace in afterlife. There's honor in war…. This one was created and encouraged by politicians of all forms and powers. From kings to now presidents and prime ministers, everybody talks about it but from their castles and palaces while men and youth are wasted on battlefields.

Many unsuspecting Christians believe what the Bible says. They believe what the Bible says as historical truth. As such, many Christians wholeheartedly accept the Gospel John’s version of Jesus’ trial and insist that the Jews were to blame for the death of Jesus. Antisemitism by the Christians has its roots in the writing of John’s Gospel. Fortunately, Prof. John Dominic Crossan showed in his book, “Who Killed Jesus,” the lies about the Jews killing Jesus.
